Tiles.Text: If chocolate tastes the best and is the healthiest, then it is the best flavor.
Chocoloate tastes better than any other flavor.
Chocolate has more antioxidants than other flavors.
SInce chocolate has the most antioxidants, it is the healthiest.
Eating Chocolate makes people live longer.
If people live longer by eating chocolate, then it's the healthiest flavor.
Since it is the most popular flavor, chocolate has to be the healthiest.
